Trails.Name: Lost in the Woods (Lower) Uphill Route
Lost in the Woods (Upper) Uphill Route

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Monday, February 2, 2026 3:00 PM Please note that the Parking Lot at Stump Alley Express (Chair 2) will be closed February 3-6. Street parking will be available. Please plan accordingly. Sunny skies on tap today with light winds and temps climbing into the 40s. 24 lifts are scheduled to spin, conditions permitting. Start early for firm, fast turns, then enjoy the slow softening as the day warms up. 
 
Conditions and Visibility: Sunny skies, light winds, and temps into the high 40s today. Groomers start crisp and carve-ready this morning, then soften up in the sun this afternoon. 
Lift status: 24 lifts are on the schedule to operate today, conditions permitting. 
Safety: In control is the way we roll - Always stay in control. You must be able to stop or avoid people or objects. Visit our Safety page for more tips. Our on-mountain emergency hotline is: 760.934.0611
Road Conditions: Roads are mostly clear, but slick spots may exist in the shade. Drive with caution. Check our Road Conditions page for the latest status.
